DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to assess uniocular and binocular unaided distance, intermediate, and near VA; contrast sensitivity, accommodation amplitude, stereopsis, glare testing, ocular aberrations and the clinical satisfaction assessment after bilateral implant of the Restor IOL.
DOC.brief_title: Clinical Assessment of Visual Function With the Acrysof ReSTOR Multifocal IOL
DOC.criteria: ≥21 years of either gender or any race Potential postop VA 20/20 Preop astigmatism ≤ 1.0D Able to sign the informed consent Able to complete all required postoperative visits Planned cataract removal by phaco Clear intraocular media other than cataract Signs of capsular tear, significant anterior chamber hyphema, or zonular rupture Any corneal pathology and previous corneal refractive surgery Patients with unrealistic expectations in anticipated postop VA Happy to wear glasses Occupational night driver
